column4: hello all! anybody aware of excluded hp cciss drivers in lucid's netboot files? does the update includes them? thnx..
netboot is quite minimal, use server-cd
I took that server cd, but lucid seems not supporting the cciss, all other versions do..
even from server-cd?
yes
normlly no problems on this
seems vague for a lts version to me..
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1503818
ok tnx I'll have a look.

I took a look but what I mean is probably in earlier stage: while doing a pxe boot with netboot files from the server cd. If I use the cd everything goes well but booting the network doesn't about the dl320 cciss.

I took a look but what I mean is probably in earlier stage: while doing a pxe boot with netboot files from the server cd. If I use the cd everything goes well but booting the network doesn't know about the dl320 cciss.

not over the network using pxe

or just for installation phase?

normally this goes perfect
